            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Hammond River Watershed has a 73.5 kilometers long main river stem, 125 kilometers of major tributaries and countless kilometers of minor tributaries, encompassing 433 square kilometers of diverse land use and habitat types. The Hammond River is host to one of the last self-sustaining salmon populations in the Bay of Fundy region and salmon conservation underlies much of the HRAA’s work since 1977. The water quality data collected is used to assist in making informed decisions of prioritization of our many riparian restoration projects, ensuring that we are targeting the most stressed locations. With assistance from the Environmental Trust Fund and Wildlife Trust fund, this water monitoring project also aims to build community partnerships, and promote education and stewardship of our beautiful watershed.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-9xbe-0v09
notes: The Hammond River Watershed has a 73.5 kilometers long main river stem, 125 kilometers of major tributaries and countless kilometers of minor tributaries, encompassing 433 square kilometers of diverse land use and habitat types. The Hammond River is host to one of the last self-sustaining salmon populations in the Bay of Fundy region and salmon conservation underlies much of the HRAA’s work since 1977. The water quality data collected is used to assist in making informed decisions of prioritization of our many riparian restoration projects, ensuring that we are targeting the most stressed locations. With assistance from the Environmental Trust Fund and Wildlife Trust fund, this water monitoring project also aims to build community partnerships, and promote education and stewardship of our beautiful watershed.

notes_translated.en: The Hammond River Watershed has a 73.5 kilometers long main river stem, 125 kilometers of major tributaries and countless kilometers of minor tributaries, encompassing 433 square kilometers of diverse land use and habitat types. The Hammond River is host to one of the last self-sustaining salmon populations in the Bay of Fundy region and salmon conservation underlies much of the HRAA’s work since 1977. The water quality data collected is used to assist in making informed decisions of prioritization of our many riparian restoration projects, ensuring that we are targeting the most stressed locations. With assistance from the Environmental Trust Fund and Wildlife Trust fund, this water monitoring project also aims to build community partnerships, and promote education and stewardship of our beautiful watershed.
notes_translated.fr: Le bassin versant de la rivière Hammond comprend un cours principal de 73,5 kilomètres de long, 125 kilomètres de principaux affluents et d'innombrables kilomètres d'affluents mineurs, couvrant 433 kilomètres carrés d'utilisations des terres et de types d'habitat variés. La rivière Hammond abrite l'une des dernières populations de saumon autosuffisantes de la région de la baie de Fundy et la conservation du saumon sous-tend une grande partie des travaux de la HRAA depuis 1977. Les données sur la qualité de l'eau collectées sont utilisées pour aider à prendre des décisions éclairées concernant la priorisation de nos nombreux projets de restauration des zones riveraines, en veillant à cibler les zones les plus touchées. Avec l'aide de l'Environmental Trust Fund et du Wildlife Trust Fund, ce projet de surveillance de l'eau vise également à établir des partenariats communautaires et à promouvoir l'éducation et la gestion de notre magnifique bassin versant.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Hammond River Angling Association Water Quality Monitoring Program

title_translated.en: Hammond River Angling Association Water Quality Monitoring Program
title_translated.fr: Programme de surveillance de la qualité de l'eau de la Hammond River Angling Association
